m69w, a simple search would show your just making stuff up, star blazers was the bastardized english version of space battleship yamato that was heavily edited and changed around, this is not based on star blazers, it is based on the original source material and a but of its second incarnation, also, battle tech has nothing at all to do with this in anyway and wasnt a spin off of the original or american versions, battle tech is an entirely different entity
